sentences.sContent: Trade Union leaders were charged with sedition.
sentences.sCn: 工会领导人被控犯有煽动罪。

synos.tran: 暴动；煽动性的言论或行为；妨害治安

remMethod.val: sed ( = se， 分开) + it (走) + ion → 分道扬镳； 煽动暴乱 → 煽动

words.tran: 煽动性的；扰乱治安的；参与煽动的

trans.tranOther: speech, writing, or actions intended to encourage people to disobey a government
